attributes.action: Change the law so tenancy agreements have a break clause for exceptional events
attributes.additional_details: In this COVID crisis many university students and workers have been made to go home or leave property. They are still expected to pay in full any future rent. In many university situations the payments are often a full term and there are no break clauses or surrender options.
attributes.background: Change the law to ensure that tenancy agreements must have a break or surrender clause to ensure that when there are exceptional events , such as COVID you can surrender the agreement as long as you vacate the property
